Σοφία Βογιατζάκη: Άλλαζα πίσω από τη σκηνή και οι θεατές έβλεπαν τα πάντα

02 Nov 2019, 14:57

«Και έρχονται στο τέλος οι τεχνικοί και μου λένε…»
H Σοφία Βογιατζάκη έδωσε συνέντευξη στην εκπομπή Dot και έκανε μια αποκάλυψη σχετικά με μια θεατρική παράσταση που έπαιζε και άλλαζε πίσω από τη σκηνή κατά τη διάρκεια της παράστασης και οι θεατές έβλεπαν… τα πάντα.
«Σε μένα θα πεις, που είμαι σε αμφιθεατρικό, κι έχουν βάλει οι τεχνικοί γύρω γύρω τα πανιά για να αλλάζουμε γιατί δεν έχεις χρόνο να πας κάτω στα καμαρίνια.
Και αλλάζω κι έχουν δει τα πάντα όλοι, αυτοί που ήταν ψηλά, είδαν πάντα. Και έρχονται στο τέλος οι τεχνικοί και μου λένε "δεν θέλουμε να στεναχωρηθείς, αλλά είδαν τα πάντα".
Και λέω που να άλλαζα; Δεν είχα άλλη επιλογή. Ευτυχώς δεν το ήξερα», είπε.

SK opened a criminal case over a video where children are interviewing a gay

02 Nov 2019, 14:00

MOSCOW, November 2 - RIA News. The Investigative Committee opened a criminal case under the article “Violent acts of a sexual nature” because of a YouTube video in which children ask questions to a gay person, said Yulia Ivanova, senior assistant to the head of the capital’s headquarters of the IC of Russia. Earlier, the IC and Ministry of Internal Affairs. According to the investigation, videos were posted on the Internet resource in which young and minor children talk with adults on various sexual topics.
"The investigating authorities of the State Investigative Directorate of the Investigative Committee of Russia in the city of Moscow on the fact of the dissemination of destructive information among minors on one of the Internet resources opened a criminal case on the grounds of a crime under paragraph" b "of part 4 of article 132 of the Criminal Code of Russia (" Violent sexual acts ")," - said Ivanova.
According to her, the investigators interrogated the organizer of the video shoot, now they are establishing the circle of victims, as well as finding out other circumstances of what happened. The State Duma’s Deputy Speaker Petr Tolstoy initiated a check on the line of security agencies, drawing attention to the commercials on the Real Talk channel. The Russian Interior Ministry told him (RIA Novosti has a copy of the document) that an administrative case regarding gay propaganda among minors has been instituted against the filming organizer. As a source in law enforcement agencies clarified to RIA Novosti, it turns out whether the actions of the filming organizers contain an article of the Criminal Code Russian "Debauchery." Now a video on YouTube is not available.
